alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Chesterfield; Goochland; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:18PM EDT until July 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR WESTERN CHESTERFIELD...SOUTHEASTERN GOOCHLAND...AMELIA AND CENTRAL POWHATAN COUNTIES... At 418 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sabot to near Moseley to near Jetersville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Moseley, Tuckahoe and Manakin around 425 PM EDT. Bon Air around 435 PM EDT. Mannboro around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Goodwins Store, Flat Rock, Winterpock, Pilkinton, Midlothian, Giles Mill, Subletts, Winterham, Paineville and Skinquarter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
